attributes.action: think again about the following failures.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Government Failures. 

Abolition of the 10% tax band hits the low pay group most.
Failure to kerb profits made by the utility companies and banks.
Failure to change laws that allow drunken motorists that kill getting short sentences.
Failure to build social houses that our children can afford.
Failure to allow house building in rural areas. (Sustainable areas policy)
Failure to protect the welfare of servicemen/women in combat. (Lack of equipment)
Failure to recognise illness derived from active service. 
Failure to limit immigration. 

Do you agree that the above list is a good reason NOT to vote Labour again.
 
This list is not exhaustive and no doubt you can think of many more.

On a personal note, all my family has voted Labour for over 100 years but I am now looking for an alternative and will encourage others to follow.
